profile:
Have you taken a look at your roof lately?
When you do check to see if your shingles are curling upwards, cracking or loosing any granules. These are all good signs that your roof may need some repairs or require a full re-placement. Once water enters your home it can damage your insulation, drywall, structure, furnishings, the list goes on and on. Please take my advice, do not let an exterior problem become an interior problem.

Peaks and Plateaus Roofing is based in Bobcaygeon and is proud to serve The Kawartha Lakes, Peterborough, Lindsay, Durham and surrounding regions. Polite service and quality craftsmanship is our promise. Call 705-768-5753 today to book your FREE estimate & inspection.

Peaks and Plateaus Roofing carries 2,000,000.00 in liability insurance and all of our employees are registered with and covered by the W.S.I.B. 

Commercial & Residential
Our Services 
-Shingles 
-Steel 
-Slate 
-Cedar 
-Aluminum (Soffit, Fascia & Eavestrough) 
-Flat Roofing (SBS, EPDM, TPO)

Kawartha's Cottage Roof Specialists!
